item.text: The land allotted to Joseph’s descendants extended from the Jordan at Jericho to the waters of Jericho to the east, through the desert and on up from Jericho into the hill country of Bethel.

The southern border<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318" class="">extended</st> from <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st> to <st data-num="03870" class="">Luz</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0757" class="">Arkite</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> at <st data-num="05852" class="">Ataroth</st>.
It then descended westward to Japhletite territory, as far as the territory of lower Beth Horon and Gezer, and ended at the sea.
Joseph’s descendants, Manasseh and Ephraim, were assigned their land.

The <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st> by its <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">included the following</st>:<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of their <st data-num="05159" class="">assigned land</st> to the <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="05853" class="">Ataroth Addar</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="05945" class="">upper</st> <st data-num="01032" class="">Beth Horon</st>.

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="03318" class="">extended on</st> to the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>, with <st data-num="04366" class="">Micmethath</st> on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>. <st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="04217" class="">eastward</st> to <st data-num="08387" class="">Taanath Shiloh</st> and <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> it on the <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> to <st data-num="03239" class="">Janoah</st>.

It then <st data-num="03381" class="">descended</st> from <st data-num="03239" class="">Janoah</st> to <st data-num="05852" class="">Ataroth</st> and <st data-num="05292" class="">Naarah</st>, <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03318">extended</st> to the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River.<n id="2" />

From <st data-num="08599" class="">Tappuah</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">it</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">westward</st> to the <st data-num="05158" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="07071" class="">Kanah</st> and <st data-num="01961 08444">ended</st> at the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>. <st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="05159" class="">land assigned</st> to the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01121 0669">Ephraim</st><n id="1" /> by its <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st>.
Also included were the cities set apart for the tribe of Ephraim within Manasseh’s territory, along with their towns.
The Ephraimites did not conquer the Canaanites living in Gezer. The Canaanites live among the Ephraimites to this very day and do hard labor as their servants.
